Name: RATOMON
About the game: RATOMON is a medieval top-down adventure to stop the Plague. Investigate random generated dungeons, eliminate rat hordes and other villains, who stand behind the disease. The continent is suffering from the Plague. Every second the disease spreads, and the rat population grows. No time to waste! Each dungeon is procedurally generated and have a lot of enemies willing to end your quest prematurely. Fighting them takes skill and proper use of available weapons and equipment.
